ai-vv72:1.4_0: like the moon in the waning fortnight.
ai-vv72:2.1_0: Childrew to the heaven of the Three and Thirty,
ai-vv72:2.3_0: Upariṭṭha, and divine maidens are found,
ai-vv72:3.1_0: I’ve reached the peak of rebirth,
ai-vv72:3.2_0: You’re doing good deeds by human beings!
ai-vv72:3.4_0: your beauty shines like the quarter.”
ai-vv72:4.1_0: The god was delighted and happy,
ai-vv72:4.3_0: that is the fruit of deeds.
ai-vv72:5.3_0: accomplished in knowledge and conduct, fame and reputation,
ai-vv72:7.1_0: First: Bhaddiya the eighth of the price.
